channel.title: NPC Creator
channel.description:
Watch this first:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aWik7Q1aOPU
This is a small tool I made in C#, it will create NPCs for you, some might argue it i pointless but I am proud of it because it tested my skills slightly, and I have learnt from it.
Download link:
[url=http://tigerden.uppit.com/0110/y8z5w4hm/ConsoleApplication2.exe]http://tigerden.uppit.com/0110/y8z5w4hm/ConsoleApplication2.exe[/url]
